name: Plant Care
description: Plant Care is a modern React app that helps users manage their personal gardens by tracking plant data, reminders, and watering schedules.
tech: React 19, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, Firebase, MongoDB Atlas, Recharts, Lottie, SwiperJS, AOS, Toastify, SweetAlert2, React Router v7
challenges: Integrating protected routes, managing animation performance, and syncing Firebase Auth with MongoDB data.
future: Add weather API integration, voice-based controls, and offline PWA support.

name: Bookshelf
description: Bookshelf is a dynamic React web app for managing, reviewing, and organizing personal book collections with interactive charts and social features.
tech: React, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, Firebase, Express, MongoDB, Recharts, AOS, Lottie, SweetAlert2, Toastify
challenges: Complex CRUD interactions, syncing user data across routes, and managing filtering logic for large book lists.
future: Add user badges,  and better review analytics with search features.

name: The Cox's
description: THE COX is an event booking and management platform allowing users to explore, filter, and book events with engaging animation and secure auth.
tech: React, Tailwind CSS, DaisyUI, Firebase, SwiperJS, AOS, React Fast Marquee, Toastify, Helmet Async, React Icons
challenges: Smooth booking flow with authentication, responsive slider integration, and user engagement tracking.
future: Implement real-time booking updates, multi-role admin dashboard, and Stripe payment support.
